metatags.og:title: UCPA - dcp.utah.gov
metatags.og:description: Utah Consumer Privacy Act (UCPA)(Utah Code § 13-61-101) As a Utah consumer, you have the right to protect your personal data under the UCPA, a law that became effective on December 31, 2023. Understanding your rights under the new law and how you can exercise them is essential. Likewise, businesses operating in Utah must understand their responsibilities under this new ... Read More

metatags.twitter:title: The Utah Consumer Privacy Act: Utah Becomes Fourth US State with Comprehensive Privacy Law
metatags.og:title: The Utah Consumer Privacy Act: Utah Becomes Fourth US State with Comprehensive Privacy Law | White & Case LLP
metatags.og:description: Continuing efforts at the state level to establish a data privacy framework in the US, a fourth state has passed a comprehensive consumer privacy law. Utah has joined the ranks of Colorado, California and Virginia after Governor Spencer Cox signed the Utah Consumer Privacy Act ("UCPA") on March 24, 2022. The legislation is set to take effect well after other state data privacy laws, on December 31, 2023.
metatags.twitter:description: Continuing efforts at the state level to establish a data privacy framework in the US, a fourth state has passed a comprehensive consumer privacy law. The legislation is set to take effect well after other state data privacy laws, on December 31, 2023.
